title: Cult mom Lori Vallow and hubby Chad Daybell reunite!
itunes:title: Cult mom Lori Vallow and hubby Chad Daybell reunite!
description:
Lori Vallow and Chad Daybell will be reunited as a judge rules their cases will be tried together. He cites several reasons, including the problems of seating a jury in the middle of a pandemic. The couple faces multiple charges relating to the death of Vallow's children, JJ and Tylee.

Joining Nancy Grace today:

  • Joseph Marrone - Philadelphia, criminal defense attorney, www.marronelaw.com 
  • Dr. Bethany Marshall - Psychoanalyst, Beverly Hills, ww.drbethanymarshall.com
  • Joe Scott Morgan - Professor of Forensics Jacksonville State University, Author, "Blood Beneath My Feet" featured on "Poisonous Liaisons" on True Crime Network
  • Ben Levitan - Telecommunications Expert, www.benlevitan.com
  • Nate Eaton - Reporter, East Idaho News

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
